'''''"Call Me Ishmael."''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Teyvat Fishing Guide: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to catch one fish in another player's world.

==Trivia==
*The name of the achievement is a reference to the opening words of {{w|Herman Melville}}'s 1851 novel ''{{w|Moby-Dick}}''.
